00040 using System;
00041 using MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources;
00042 
00043 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Distributions
00044 {
00052     public sealed class ChiDistribution : ContinuousDistribution
00053     {
00054         int _degreesOfFreedom;
00055         double _lngammaDegreesOfFreedomHalf;
00056         double? _mean;
00057 
00058         StandardDistribution _standard;
00059 
00060         #region Construction
00061 
00062 
00063 
00064 
00065         public
00066         ChiDistribution()
00067             : base()
00068         {
00069             _standard = new StandardDistribution(this.RandomSource);
00070             SetDistributionParameters(1);
00071         }
00072 
00081         public
00082         ChiDistribution(
00083             RandomSource random
00084             )
00085             : base(random)
00086         {
00087             _standard = new StandardDistribution(random);
00088             SetDistributionParameters(1);
00089         }
00090 
00095         public
00096         ChiDistribution(
00097             int degreesOfFreedom
00098             )
00099             : base()
00100         {
00101             _standard = new StandardDistribution(this.RandomSource);
00102             SetDistributionParameters(degreesOfFreedom);
00103         }
00104         #endregion
00105 
00110         public override RandomSource RandomSource
00111         {
00112             get
00113             {
00114                 return base.RandomSource;
00115             }
00116 
00117             set
00118             {
00119                 base.RandomSource = value;
00120                 _standard.RandomSource = value;
00121             }
00122         }
00123 
00124         #region Distribution Parameters
00125 
00126 
00127 
00128         public int DegreesOfFreedom
00129         {
00130             get { return _degreesOfFreedom; }
00131             set { SetDistributionParameters(value); }
00132         }
00133 
00137         public
00138         void
00139         SetDistributionParameters(
00140             int degreesOfFreedom
00141             )
00142         {
00143             if(!IsValidParameterSet(degreesOfFreedom))
00144             {
00145                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentParameterSetInvalid, "degreesOfFreedom");
00146             }
00147 
00148             _degreesOfFreedom = degreesOfFreedom;
00149             _lngammaDegreesOfFreedomHalf = Fn.GammaLn(0.5 * degreesOfFreedom);
00150             _mean = null;
00151         }
00152 
00159         public static
00160         bool
00161         IsValidParameterSet(
00162             int degreesOfFreedom
00163             )
00164         {
00165             return degreesOfFreedom > 0.0;
00166         }
00167         #endregion
00168 
00169         #region Distribution Properties
00170 
00171 
00172 
00173         public override double Minimum
00174         {
00175             get { return 0.0; }
00176         }
00177 
00181         public override double Maximum
00182         {
00183             get { return double.MaxValue; }
00184         }
00185 
00189         public override double Mean
00190         {
00191             get
00192             {
00193                 return _mean ?? (double)(_mean = Constants.Sqrt2 * Math.Exp(
00194                         Fn.GammaLn(0.5 * (_degreesOfFreedom + 1)) - _lngammaDegreesOfFreedomHalf));
00195             }
00196         }
00197 
00204         public override double Median
00205         {
00206             get { throw new NotSupportedException(); }
00207         }
00208 
00212         public override double Variance
00213         {
00214             get
00215             {
00216                 double mean = Mean;
00217                 return _degreesOfFreedom - mean * mean;
00218             }
00219         }
00220 
00224         public override double Skewness
00225         {
00226             get
00227             {
00228                 double variance = Variance;
00229                 return Mean / Math.Pow(variance, 1.5) * (1.0 - 2.0 * variance);
00230             }
00231         }
00232 
00236         public override
00237         double
00238         ProbabilityDensity(
00239             double x
00240             )
00241         {
00242             return Math.Exp((1.0 - 0.5 * _degreesOfFreedom) * Constants.Ln2 + (_degreesOfFreedom - 1) * Math.Log(x) - (0.5 * x * x) - _lngammaDegreesOfFreedomHalf);
00243         }
00244 
00248         public override
00249         double
00250         CumulativeDistribution(
00251             double x
00252             )
00253         {
00254             return Fn.GammaRegularized(0.5 * _degreesOfFreedom, 0.5 * x * x);
00255         }
00256         #endregion
00257 
00258         #region Generator
00259 
00260 
00261 
00262 
00263         public override
00264         double
00265         NextDouble()
00266         {
00267             double sum = 0.0;
00268             for(int i = 0; i < _degreesOfFreedom; i++)
00269             {
00270                 double std = _standard.NextDouble();
00271                 sum += std * std;
00272             }
00273 
00274             return Math.Sqrt(sum);
00275         }
00276         #endregion
00277     }
00278 }
